pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider OOO (2010, TV show)$(br2)Used by $(l:ooo/riders/ooo)Kamen Rider OOO$(/l)$(br2)Used on a block to summon the Ridevendor
Can change between Machine Vendor Mode and Machine Bike Mode by right-clicking while sneaking
Gives a $(l:ooo/arsenal/candroids)Candroid$(/l) when right-clicked with a $(l:ooo/items/cellmedal)Cell Medal$(/l)
Converted by right-clicking with a $(l:ooo/arsenal/candroids#tora_candroid)Tora Candroid$(/l)
